__documentation.summary: Opens the document with link selector browser in which the user can select a node.

params.name: browseContextDocumentId
description: (Optional) This id is sent to the CMS when the browse call is made. If
the CMS resolves a hierarchy for a reference in the metadata of a reference,
the folder containing the browseContextDocument will be opened.
By default the browseContextDocument is set to the focusedDocument or,
when the focusedDocument is not available, to the first document in the hierarchy.

params.name: documentId
description: (Optional) Can be used to open the document with link selector browser with
a node preselected. Should only be used in combination with nodeId.

params.name: linkableElementsQuery
description: (Optional) Selector used to find the nodes which can be selected by the user.
Defaults to `//*[@id]`.

params.name: modalIcon
params.description: (Optional) The icon being shown at the top of the modal. The value should be a valid font-awsome icon name.

params.name: modalPrimaryButtonLabel
params.description: (Optional) The label for the primary button. Defaults to `t__Insert`.

params.name: modalTitle
params.description: (Optional) The title being shown at the top of the modal. Defaults to `t__Select a link`.

params.name: nodeId
description: (Optional) Can be used to open the document with link selector browser with
a node preselected. Should only be used in combination with documentId.

returns.name: documentId
returns.description: The documentId of the document where the selected node is in.

returns.name: nodeId
returns.description: The nodeId of the selected node.

__documentation.summary: Opens the image browser in which the user can select an image.

params.name: browseContextDocumentId
description: (Optional) This id is sent to the CMS when the browse call is made.
If the CMS resolves a hierarchy for a reference in the metadata of a reference,
the folder containing the browseContextDocument will be opened.
By default the browseContextDocument is set to the focusedDocument or,
when the focusedDocument is not available, to the first document in the hierarchy.

params.name: modalIcon
params.description: (Optional) The icon being shown at the top of the modal. The value should be a valid font-awsome icon name.

params.name: modalPrimaryButtonLabel
params.description: (Optional) The label for the primary button. Defaults to `t__Insert`.

params.name: modalTitle
params.description: (Optional) The title being shown at the top of the modal. Defaults to `t__Select an image`.

params.name: selectedImageId
description: (Optional) Can be used to open the image browser with an image preselected.

returns.name: selectedImageId
returns.description: The remoteId of the selected image.

__documentation.summary: Opens the document browser in which the user can select a document.

params.name: browseContextDocumentId
description: (Optional) This id is sent to the CMS when the browse call is made.
If the CMS resolves a hierarchy for a reference in the metadata of a reference,
the folder containing the browseContextDocument will be opened.
By default the browseContextDocument is set to the focusedDocument or,
when the focusedDocument is not available, to the first document in the hierarchy.

params.name: documentId
description: (Optional) Can be used to open the document browser with a document preselected.

params.name: modalIcon
params.description: (Optional) The icon being shown at the top of the modal. The value should be a valid font-awsome icon name.

params.name: modalPrimaryButtonLabel
params.description: (Optional) The label for the primary button. Defaults to `t__Insert`.

params.name: modalTitle
params.description: (Optional) The title being shown at the top of the modal. Defaults to `t__Select a document`.

returns.name: documentId
returns.description: The documentId of the selected document.

returns.name: remoteDocumentId
returns.description: The remoteDocumentId of the selected document.

__documentation.summary: Opens the document template browser in which the user can select a document template.

params.name: browseContextDocumentId
description: (Optional) This id is sent to the CMS when the browse call is made.
By default the browseContextDocument is set to the focusedDocument or,
when the focusedDocument is not available, to the first document in the hierarchy.

params.name: modalIcon
params.description: (Optional) The icon being shown at the top of the modal. The value should be a valid font-awsome icon name.

params.name: modalPrimaryButtonLabel
params.description: (Optional) The label for the primary button. Defaults to `t__Select`.

params.name: modalTitle
params.description: (Optional) The title being shown at the top of the modal. Defaults to `t__Select a template`.

returns.name: remoteDocumentId
returns.description: The remoteDocumentId of the selected document template.

summary: Opens the document browser on open in which the user can select a document.
When the modal is open, the user can switch to the create document form,
to create a new document by choosing a template.

params.name: browseContextDocumentId
description: (Optional) This id is sent to the CMS when the browse call is made.
If the CMS resolves a hierarchy for a reference in the metadata of a reference,
the folder containing the browseContextDocument will be opened.
By default the browseContextDocument is set to the focusedDocument or,
when the focusedDocument is not available, to the first document in the hierarchy.

params.name: modalIcon
params.description: (Optional) The icon being shown at the top of the modal. The value should be a valid font-awsome icon name.

params.name: modalTitle
params.description: (Optional) The title being shown at the top of the modal. Defaults to `t__Open or create document`.

returns.name: documentId
returns.description: (Open document) The documentId of the selected document.

returns.name: remoteDocumentId
returns.description: (Open document) The remoteDocumentId of the selected document.

returns.name: selectedDocumentTemplateId
returns.description: (create document) The remoteDocumentId of the selected document template.

returns.name: selectedFolderId
returns.description: (create document) The folderId of the selected folder.

summary: Opens the create form, for creating a new document by choosing a template.

params.name: browseContextDocumentId
description: (Optional) This id is sent to the CMS when the browse call is made.
If the CMS resolves a hierarchy for a reference in the metadata of a reference,
the folder containing the browseContextDocument will be opened.
By default the browseContextDocument is set to the focusedDocument or,
when the focusedDocument is not available, to the first document in the hierarchy.

params.name: modalIcon
params.description: (Optional) The icon being shown at the top of the modal. The value should be a valid font-awsome icon name.

params.name: modalTitle
params.description: (Optional) The title being shown at the top of the modal. Defaults to `t__Create new document`.

returns.name: selectedDocumentTemplateId
returns.description: The remoteDocumentId of the selected document template.

returns.name: selectedFolderId
returns.description: The folderId of the selected folder.
